results.name: wordpress-namespace/wordpress-75c7f5f87b-v2shd

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: wordpress-namespace/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-75c7f5f87b-v2shd], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service can't find ready endpoints because the specified pod isn't ready.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs wordpress-75c7f5f87b-v2shd`.
3. Verify readiness probe settings.
4. Ensure pod dependencies are running.
